name: Trial of Twins - Eloy’s Connection
description:
Slip into the role of Eloy and follow your grandfather's mysterious call. Explore an old Mayan temple where ancient spirits test your mind and courage. 

But don’t be afraid! An amulet from your grandpa lends you its powers to pass the Trial of Twins.

This academic project is based on a game jam game called Colorful Sticky Objects where you use a utility gun to build bridges. Trial of Twins is a first-person adventure inspired by the old Tomb Raider titles.

Feedback

We would love to hear your opinion on Trial of Twins! You can give us feedback via the comments below. Or you can contact us on Twitter, Instagram and Reddit. Also feel free to follow us for latest news.

Support

If you want to support us you can find us on Patreon and Ko-fi.

More Games

You can download all of our game jam games for free on our website: produktivkeller.com.
